description.displayText: I have been friends with Marima for 6 years.  You will not find a more honest, dependable, caring and loving person anywhere. She is very considerate and will help whenever called upon. She is a nurturer and developer. She is always striving to do better for herself and to help others. She was a devoted daughter while she cared for her mother in her last years in her home. I highly recommend Marima for a care-giving role. She has a pleasant and positive attitude.
description.originalText: I have been friends with Marima for 6 years.  You will not find a more honest, dependable, caring and loving person anywhere. She is very considerate and will help whenever called upon. She is a nurturer and developer. She is always striving to do better for herself and to help others. She was a devoted daughter while she cared for her mother in her last years in her home. I highly recommend Marima for a care-giving role. She has a pleasant and positive attitude.

description.displayText: I have known Marima for 7 years. There are so many wonderful things I could say about Marima.  She is the most friendly, courteous, professional service oriented person I have encountered often going the extra step to ensure that everyone feels welcomed and respected. Her service skills are the best I have seen.  She continuously strives to do her best. Marima also displays top notch integrity. She has always gone the extra mile with a smile on her face at all times.  I highly recommend Marima for any care-giving role.
